verses.verse: The <S%H1697>word<s%> that <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> <S%H5921>concerning<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H3079>Jehoiakim<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> (that was the <S%H7224>first<s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%>),

<S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> the <S%H5030>prophet<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

"From the <S%H7969>thirteenth<s%> <S%H6240><s%> <S%H8141>year<s%> of <S%H2977>Josiah<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H526>Amon,<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> even to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H2088>these<s%> twenty-three <S%H8141>years<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H1961>come<s%> to me, and I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> to you <S%H7925>again<s%> and <S%H1696>again,<s%> but you have not <S%H8085>listened.<s%>

"And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H7971>sent<s%> to you <S%H3605>all<s%> His <S%H5650>servants<s%> the <S%H5030>prophets<s%> <S%H7925>again<s%> and <S%H7971>again,<s%> but you have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H5186>inclined<s%> your <S%H241>ear<s%> to <S%H8085>hear,<s%>

<S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H7725>'Turn<s%> <S%H4994>now<s%> <S%H376>everyone<s%> from his <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1870>way<s%> and from the <S%H7455>evil<s%> of your <S%H4611>deeds,<s%> and <S%H3427>dwell<s%> on the <S%H127>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has <S%H5414>given<s%> to you and your forefathers <S%H1>forever<s%> <S%H4480><s%> and <S%H5769>ever;<s%>

and do not <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H430>gods<s%> to <S%H5647>serve<s%> them and to <S%H7812>worship<s%> them, and do not <S%H3707>provoke<s%> Me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands,<s%> and I will <S%H7489>do<s%> you <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H7489>harm.<s%>'

"Yet you have not <S%H8085>listened<s%> to Me," <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> "in <S%H4616>order<s%> that you might <S%H3707>provoke<s%> Me to <S%H3707>anger<s%> with the <S%H4639>work<s%> of your <S%H3027>hands<s%> to your own <S%H9563>harm.<s%>
<S%H3651>"Therefore<s%> <S%H3541>thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H3282>'Because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you have not <S%H8085>obeyed<s%> My <S%H1697>words,<s%>

<S%H2009>behold,<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'and [I will send] to <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon,<s%> My <S%H5650>servant,<s%> and will <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> its <S%H3427>inhabitants,<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H5439>about;<s%> and I will <S%H2763>utterly<s%> <S%H2763>destroy<s%> them, and <S%H7760>make<s%> them a <S%H8047>horror,<s%> and a <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> and an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H2723>desolation.<s%>

'Moreover, I will take from them the <S%H6>voice<s%> of <S%H6963>joy<s%> and the <S%H8342>voice<s%> of <S%H6963>gladness,<s%> the <S%H8057>voice<s%> of the <S%H6963>bridegroom<s%> and the <S%H2860>voice<s%> of the <S%H6963>bride,<s%> the <S%H3618>sound<s%> of the <S%H6963>millstones<s%> and the <S%H7347>light<s%> of the <S%H216>lamp.<s%>

'And <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> shall be a <S%H2723>desolation<s%> and a <S%H8047>horror,<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> shall <S%H5647>serve<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

'Then it will be when <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> are <S%H4390>completed<s%> I will <S%H6485>punish<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> and that <S%H1471>nation,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> 'for their <S%H5771>iniquity,<s%> and the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans;<s%> and I will <S%H7760>make<s%> it an <S%H5769>everlasting<s%> <S%H8077>desolation.<s%>

'And I will <S%H935>bring<s%> upon that <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> My <S%H1697>words<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1696>pronounced<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> it, <S%H3605>all<s%> that is <S%H3789>written<s%> in <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5612>book,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H3414>Jeremiah<s%> has <S%H5012>prophesied<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations.<s%>

'(For <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H4428>kings<s%> shall <S%H5647>make<s%> <S%H5647>slaves<s%> of them, <S%H1571>even<s%> them; and I will <S%H9608>recompense<s%> them according to their <S%H6467>deeds,<s%> and according to the <S%H4639>work<s%> of their <S%H3027>hands.<s%>)' "

For <S%H3541>thus<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> to me, <S%H3947>"Take<s%> <S%H384>this<s%> <S%H3563>cup<s%> of the <S%H3196>wine<s%> of <S%H2534>wrath<s%> from My <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and cause <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> I <S%H7971>send<s%> you, to <S%H8248>drink<s%> it.

"And they shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> and <S%H1607>stagger<s%> and <S%H1984>go<s%> <S%H1984>mad<s%> <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> that I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> them."

Then I <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> from the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>'s <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and made <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H8248>drink,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> the Lord <S%H7971>sent<s%> me:

<S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> and its <S%H4428>kings<s%> [and] its <S%H8269>princes,<s%> to <S%H5414>make<s%> them a <S%H2723>ruin,<s%> a <S%H8047>horror,<s%> a <S%H8322>hissing,<s%> and a <S%H7045>curse,<s%> as it is <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H3117>day;<s%>
<S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> his <S%H5650>servants,<s%> his <S%H8269>princes,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> his <S%H5971>people;<s%>

and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H9434>foreign<s%> <S%H9434>people,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H5780>Uz,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6430>Philistines<s%> (even <S%H831>Ashkelon,<s%> <S%H5804>Gaza,<s%> <S%H6138>Ekron,<s%> and the <S%H7611>remnant<s%> of <S%H795>Ashdod<s%>);
<S%H9000>Edom,<s%> <S%H4124>Moab,<s%> and the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon;<s%>

and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6865>Tyre,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6721>Sidon,<s%> and the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H339>coastlands<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are <S%H5676>beyond<s%> the <S%H3220>sea;<s%>
and <S%H1719>Dedan,<s%> <S%H8485>Tema,<s%> <S%H938>Buz,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> who <S%H7112>cut<s%> the <S%H6285>corners<s%> [of their hair;]

and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H6152>Arabia<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H9434>foreign<s%> <S%H9434>people<s%> who <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in the <S%H4057>desert;<s%>
and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H9106>Zimri,<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H5867>Elam,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of <S%H4074>Media;<s%>

and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4428>kings<s%> of the <S%H6828>north,<s%> <S%H7138>near<s%> and <S%H7350>far,<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> with <S%H251>another;<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground,<s%> and the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H8347>Sheshach<s%> shall <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> them.

"And you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> the <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H8354>"Drink,<s%> be <S%H7937>drunk,<s%> <S%H7006>vomit,<s%> <S%H5307>fall,<s%> and <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> more <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I will <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H996>among<s%> you. "'

"And it will be, <S%H3588>if<s%> they <S%H3985>refuse<s%> to <S%H3947>take<s%> the <S%H3563>cup<s%> from your <S%H3027>hand<s%> to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> then you will <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3541>'Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> "You shall <S%H8354>surely<s%> <S%H8354>drink!<s%>

"For <S%H2009>behold,<s%> I am <S%H2490>beginning<s%> to <S%H7489>work<s%> <S%H7489>calamity<s%> in [this] <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H7121>called<s%> by My <S%H8034>name,<s%> and shall you be <S%H5352>completely<s%> <S%H5352>free<s%> from <S%H5352>punishment<s%>? You will not be <S%H5352>free<s%> from <S%H5352>punishment;<s%> for I am <S%H7121>summoning<s%> a <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%>" <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>'

"Therefore you shall <S%H5012>prophesy<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> them <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>words,<s%> and you shall <S%H559>say<s%> to them, 'The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> will <S%H7580>roar<s%> from on <S%H4791>high,<s%> And <S%H5414>utter<s%> His <S%H6963>voice<s%> from His <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H4583>habitation;<s%> He will <S%H7580>roar<s%> <S%H7580>mightily<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> His <S%H5116>fold.<s%> He will <S%H1959>shout<s%> like those who <S%H1869>tread<s%> [the grapes,] <S%H413>Against<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

'A <S%H7588>clamor<s%> has <S%H935>come<s%> to the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth,<s%> <S%H3588>Because<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> has a <S%H7379>controversy<s%> with the <S%H1471>nations.<s%> He is <S%H8199>entering<s%> into <S%H8199>judgment<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1320>flesh;<s%> As for the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> He has <S%H5414>given<s%> them to the <S%H2719>sword,<s%>' <S%H5002>declares<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>"

<S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> <S%H2009>"Behold,<s%> <S%H9567>evil<s%> is <S%H3318>going<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> From <S%H1471>nation<s%> to <S%H1471>nation,<s%> And a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5591>storm<s%> is being <S%H5782>stirred<s%> up From the <S%H3411>remotest<s%> <S%H3411>parts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%>

"And those <S%H2491>slain<s%> by the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> on that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be from one <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> to the <S%H7097>other.<s%> <S%H776><s%> They shall not be <S%H5594>lamented,<s%> <S%H622>gathered,<s%> or <S%H6912>buried;<s%> they shall be like <S%H1828>dung<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>ground.<s%>

<S%H3213>"Wail,<s%> you <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> and <S%H2199>cry;<s%> And <S%H6428>wallow<s%> [in ashes,] you <S%H117>masters<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock;<s%> For the <S%H3117>days<s%> of your <S%H2873>slaughter<s%> and your <S%H8600>dispersions<s%> have <S%H4390>come,<s%> And you shall <S%H5307>fall<s%> like a <S%H2532>choice<s%> <S%H3627>vessel.<s%>
<S%H4498>"Flight<s%> shall perish from the <S%H6>shepherds,<s%> And <S%H7462>escape<s%> from the <S%H6413>masters<s%> of the <S%H117>flock.<s%>

"[Hear] the <S%H6963>sound<s%> of the <S%H6818>cry<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds,<s%> And the <S%H3215>wailing<s%> of the <S%H117>masters<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock!<s%> For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> is <S%H7703>destroying<s%> their <S%H4830>pasture,<s%>
"And the <S%H7965>peaceful<s%> <S%H9318>folds<s%> are <S%H1826>made<s%> <S%H1826>silent<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>

"He has <S%H5800>left<s%> His <S%H5520>hiding<s%> <S%H5520>place<s%> like the <S%H3715>lion;<s%> For their <S%H776>land<s%> has <S%H1961>become<s%> a <S%H8047>horror<s%> <S%H4480>Because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of the <S%H2740>fierceness<s%> of the <S%H3238>oppressing<s%> [sword,] And <S%H4480>because<s%> <S%H6440><s%> of His <S%H2740>fierce<s%> <S%H639>anger.<s%>"
